purpose: Generates a comprehensive daily summary in markdown format from a collection of individual AI agent session summaries.

dependencies.description: Requires the JSON output from one or more `dspy_chat_summarizer` runs.

inputs.agent_summaries_file: string (Path to a JSON file containing a list of agent summaries.)

outputs.daily_summary_markdown: string (The generated daily summary in markdown format.)

path_to_scripting: This module is a self-contained Python script. It would be invoked by a daily reporting workflow. It would take a JSON file containing multiple agent summaries as input. The script would then use an LLM to synthesize these individual summaries into a comprehensive daily summary in markdown format. This markdown output would then be saved to the appropriate location.
